titleStmt.title: His Majesties message to the Lords and Commons in Parliament, Sept. 5 together with a declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament in answer to the said message.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Husbands ad John Franck,

notesStmt.note: Lunæ 5, September, 1642. Ordered by the Lords and Commons in Parliament, that this be forthwith printed and published : H. Elsinge, Cler. Parl. Dom: Com."
